title: Dr Abdul Hafeez Sheikh takes oath as federal minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 11 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Friday administered oath of office to Dr Abdul Hafeez Sheikh as federal minister.
The oath-taking held at Aiwan-e-Sadr was attended by ministers and senior officials.
Dr Abdul Hafeez Sheikh was previously serving as the Prime Ministerâ€™s Adviser on Finance and Revenue
